content: The difference with this ending, however, is that when the gold crown drops into the water, and The Old Monkey picks it up and places it on The Destined One's head, there will be a flash where The Destined One opens his eyes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'Ending 2 - The (True) Secret Ending'.
The content is as follows:
The difference with this ending, however, is that when the gold crown drops into the water, and The Old Monkey picks it up and places it on The Destined One's head, there will be a flash where The Destined One opens his eyes.
